item.title: How to Develop a Simple Web Application Using Docker, Nginx, PHP, and MongoDB
item.description: I’m developing an application that takes data from different sources, processes it, and prepares reports. In this series of articles, I will explain how to install and configure the tools, application, and database to develop and run the application. About the application and choice of tools The application I develop gets data from GitHub, Jira, and websites via API, processes it and creates reports according to the desired requirements. The application is developed with PHP version 8+ and Nginx as a web server, and MongoDB as a database.
